## ICartesian2dUserTransform interface

A user transform to apply before the screen space transform. By default this is identity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICartesian2dUserTransform<TArray extends TTypedArray> extends IUserTransform 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [IUserTransform](./core.iusertransform.md)

|  [xTransformEnabled](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dusertransform.xtransformenabled.md) | boolean |  |
|  [yTransformEnabled](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dusertransform.ytransformenabled.md) | boolean |  |
